00049 //
00050 // ScoredExtentAccumulator
00051 //
00052 // 24 February 2004 -- tds
00053 //
00054 
00055 #ifndef INDRI_SCOREDEXTENTACCUMULATOR_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_SCOREDEXTENTACCUMULATOR_HPP
00057 
00058 #include "indri/SkippingCapableNode.hpp"
00059 
00060 class ScoredExtentAccumulator : public EvaluatorNode {
00061 private:
00062   BeliefNode* _belief;
00063   SkippingCapableNode* _skipping;
00064   std::priority_queue<ScoredExtentResult> _scores;
00065   std::vector<ScoredExtentResult> _finalScores;
00066   int _resultsRequested;
00067   std::string _name;
00068   EvaluatorNode::MResults _results;
00069 
00070 public:
00071   ScoredExtentAccumulator( std::string name, BeliefNode* belief, int resultsRequested = -1 ) :
00072     _belief(belief),
00073     _resultsRequested(resultsRequested),
00074     _name(name),
00075     _skipping(0)
00076   {
00077     _skipping = dynamic_cast<SkippingCapableNode*>(belief);
00078   }
00079 
00080   void evaluate( int documentID, int documentLength ) {
00081     if( _belief->hasMatch( documentID ) ) {
00082       const greedy_vector<ScoredExtentResult>& documentScores = _belief->score( documentID, 0, documentLength, documentLength );
00083 
00084       for( unsigned int i=0; i<documentScores.size(); i++ ) {
00085         _scores.push( documentScores[i] );
00086       }
00087 
00088       while( int(_scores.size()) > _resultsRequested && _resultsRequested > 0 ) {
00089         _scores.pop();
00090         if( _skipping ) {
00091           double worstScore = _scores.top().score;
00092           _skipping->setThreshold( worstScore - DBL_MIN );
00093         }
00094       }
00095     }
00096   }
00097   
00098   int nextCandidateDocument() {
00099     return _belief->nextCandidateDocument();
00100   }
00101 
00102   const std::string& getName() const {
00103     return _name;
00104   }
00105 
00106   const EvaluatorNode::MResults& getResults() {
00107     _results.clear();
00108 
00109     if( !_scores.size() )
00110       return _results;
00111     
00112     // making a copy of the heap here so the method can be const
00113     std::priority_queue<ScoredExtentResult> heapCopy = _scores;
00114     std::vector<ScoredExtentResult>& scoreVec = _results["scores"];
00115 
00116     // puts scores into the vector in descending order
00117     scoreVec.reserve( heapCopy.size() );
00118     for( int i=(int)heapCopy.size()-1; i>=0; i-- ) {
00119       scoreVec.push_back( heapCopy.top() );
00120       heapCopy.pop();
00121     }
00122 
00123     return _results;
00124   }
00125 };
00126 
00127 #endif // INDRI_SCOREDEXTENTACCUMULATOR_HPP
